name: Get Out! Snakes!
description:
Get out! Snakes! It's a new way to play the famous 90's cell phone classic, now you're not the snake, you're the snake's target!

Save your apple friends on an adventure with 5 different worlds that tell the story of how a heroic red apple, guardian of the green apple tree, saves green apples from a terrible snake attack!



So ... save the apples before the snake attacks, but stay tuned, as you too can be attacked!

Features:

  • 5 different worlds with 5 levels each

  • Singleplayer or multiplayer story mode

  • 2 players battle mode

  • Original songs

  • Original characters

  • Great repetition value
